author: lightclient
content: What do we think of this "ForkchoiceUpdatedV2 then ForkchoiceUpdatedV3 Valid Payload Building Requests" hive test? Seems like it requires we accept txs enabled in cancun before cancun is activated. At first I thought we could fix this by allowing txs N seconds / blocks before cancun activates, but the genesis timestamp of the test is 0x1234 so I think it would only be satisfied if we make it so that we accept blob txs if cancun is scheduled for the network at all.

author: rjected
content: need a confirmation / sanity check on an EIP-4788 detail: the nonce of the system addr (0xfff...ffe) account should not be incremented right?
